content: crochet a sweet and pretty **pumpkin** 1 to decorate the halloween table or just to decorate for fall enjoy **skill level ** intermediate **crochet hook ** 3 5 mm **size approx ** 9 x 9 cm **materials ** pins black embroidery thread stuffing safety eyes 9 mm a small piece of pink yarn **yarn ** rainbow cotton 8/6 orange #057 - 1 skein light green #019 - 1 skein light brown #006 - 1 skein **abbreviations ** st - stitch chain - chain stitch single_crochet - single_crochet 1 increase - work 2 sts in same st 1 decrease - work 2 sts together slip_stitch - slip_stitch half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet 1 https //hobbii com/kawaii-pumpkin utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=kawaii-pumpkin+hbtrack&utm_term=swr
